meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by myalgia.
meanings.sent1: After the workout, she felt myalgic muscles in her arms.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with myalgic pain in her legs.
meanings.sent3: The myalgic sensation in her back made her walk like a robot.
meanings.sent4: The myalgic ache in her shoulders was like carrying a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The myalgic discomfort in her neck was a constant reminder of the strain.

meanings.sent1: The myalgic condition led to persistent muscle soreness.
meanings.sent2: His myalgic symptoms included muscle stiffness and fatigue.
meanings.sent3: The myalgic side effect of the medication was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The myalgic impact of the injury affected his daily activities.
meanings.sent5: The myalgic nature of the disease made movement difficult.
